targets.query:
from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_server_properties")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "server_memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Memory Manager")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Target Server Memory (KB)" or r["counter"] == "Total Server Memory (KB)")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Databases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Transactions/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "instance", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:SQL Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Batch Requests/sec" or r["counter"] == "SQL Compilations/sec" or r["counter"] == "SQL Re-Compilations/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_waitstats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wait_time_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "wait_type", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_waitstats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "waiting_tasks_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "wait_type", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Buffer Manager")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Buffer cache hit ratio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Buffer Manager")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Page lookups/sec" or r["counter"] == "Page reads/sec" or r["counter"] == "Page writes/sec" or r["counter"] == "Readahead pages/sec" or r["counter"] == "Checkpoint pages/sec" or r["counter"] == "Lazy writes/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Access Methods")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Full Scans/sec" or r["counter"] == "Index Searches/sec" or r["counter"] == "Page Splits/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Buffer Manager")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Page life expectancy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_memory_clerks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size_kb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["clerk_type"] == "Buffer Pool" or r["clerk_type"] == "Connection Pool" or r["clerk_type"] == "Log Pool" or r["clerk_type"] == "Object Plans" or r["clerk_type"] == "SQL Plans" or r["clerk_type"] == "SQL Optimizer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "clerk_type", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_database_io")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_latency_ms" or r["_field"] == "write_latency_ms")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "logical_filename", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_database_io")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "logical_filename", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_database_io")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes" or r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "logical_filename", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Databases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Data File(s) Size (KB)")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "instance", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Databases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Log File(s) Size (KB)")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "instance", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Latches")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Latch Waits/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Locks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Lock Waits/sec" or r["counter"] == "Lock Timeouts/sec" or r["counter"] == "Number of Deadlocks/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "Total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Databases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Log Flushes/sec" or r["counter"] == "Log Flush Wait Time" or r["counter"] == "Write Transactions/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "Total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:General Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Logins/sec" or r["counter"] == "Logouts/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:General Statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "User Connections" or r["counter"] == "Processes blocked")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

from(bucket: "sqlmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Database Replica")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Transaction Delay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "instance", "_value"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Database Replica")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Log Apply Ready Queue" or r["counter"] == "Recovery Queue" or r["counter"] == "Log Apply Pending Queue" or r["counter"] == "Redone Bytes/sec" or r["counter"] == "Log Bytes Received/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "Total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sqlserver_performance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Availability Replica")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Bytes Sent to Transport/sec" or r["counter"] == "Bytes Sent to Replica/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "Total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "SQLServer:Databases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["counter"] == "Log Bytes Flushed/sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "Total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_db_type"] == "SQLServer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sql_instance"] == "${hostname}")

  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "counter", "_value"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "sql_instance",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "sql_instance",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
